code: var TPS_1991_A_2005=0.07;var TPS_2006_A_2007=0.06;var TPS_2008_A_MAINTENANT=0.05;var TVQ_1991_A_1993=0.04;var TVQ_1994_A_1997=0.065;var TVQ_1998_A_2010=0.075;var TVQ_2011=0.085;var TVQ_2012=0.095;var TVQ_2013_A_MAINTENANT=0.09975;function calculTPS(year,montant){var taxe=montant;if(year>=2008){taxe=taxe*TPS_2008_A_MAINTENANT;}else if(year>=2006){taxe=taxe*TPS_2006_A_2007;}else{taxe=taxe*TPS_1991_A_2005;}return taxe;}function calculTVQ(year,montant){var taxe=montant;if(year>=2013){taxe=taxe*TVQ_2013_A_MAINTENANT;}else if(year>=2012){taxe=taxe*TVQ_2012;}else if(year>=2011){taxe=taxe*TVQ_2011;}else if(year>=1998){taxe=taxe*TVQ_1998_A_2010;}else if(year>=1994){taxe=taxe*TVQ_1994_A_1997;}else{taxe=taxe*TVQ_1991_A_1993;}return taxe;}export{calculTPS,calculTVQ};
